means: （按钮式弹簧开启的）弹簧小折刀

sentence.Network_en: Lenny swayed for a moment, then dropped to the ground, impaling himself on his switchblade.
sentence.Network_cn: 伦尼晃了一下，然后倒在了地上，他的弹簧刀刺穿了自己的身体。

sentence.Network_en: Fought like a switchblade so no one could take him down.
sentence.Network_cn: 打架像刀锋一样锐利,没有一个人能把他打倒.

sentence.Network_en: Just give him your money. He's got a switchblade.
sentence.Network_cn: 把你的钱给他, 他带着弹簧刀呢.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 名为弹簧刀（Switchblade）的无人机，由加州一间公司研发，重量不到两公斤，可放入士兵的背包，由小型电池引擎驱动，飞行模式 …
NDS《神秘P.I. 肖像神偷》剧情详尽攻略 _... ... Bath Time Buddy 鸭子 Switchblade 弹簧折刀 Trunk Owner 主干线.
※ 闸刀（Switchblade）　　DARPA早已经成功开发了无人驾驶的飞行器UAVs。
这种飞行器被命名为“弹簧小折刀（switchblade）”(Switchblade)，一种可改变翼扫(机翼相对机身的角度)的无人机，既有很高的低速飞行效率，能执行 …

list.abs: offers a higher level of safety than automatic knives ( switchblade type ) .提供了比弹簧类自动刀更高的安全等级。
Witness found a switchblade on the ground ., 目击者在地上找到了一把弹簧刀.

entry.def: A switchblade is a knife with a blade that is hidden in the handle and that springs out when a button is pressed.

means.word_mean: 1. a pocketknife with a blade that springs open at the press of a button

auth_sentence.content: The Switchblade might even have "green" appeal.

auth_sentence.content: Rice also fronts a more sombre Switchblade.

auth_sentence.content: But the Switchblade appears to be the most practical air-ground hybrid.
